sentences.chinese: 我可沒有操持農事的本事。

sentences.english: What is the situation of informal cooperation between farmers in the farming system?
sentences.chinese: 在農事系統中農民間非正式合作狀況？

sentences.english: I just know this festival is from Chinese lunar calendar.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道這是一個源於農事曆法的節日。

sentences.english: But at least we could save farming.
sentences.chinese: 但我們至少可以挽救農事。

sentences.english: The Farming Poetry in The book of songs is the outcome of the agriculture culture in the Zhou dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《詩經》農事詩是周代農業文化背景下的產物。

sentences.english: His elder brother takes care of the farming.
Boldwood could not concentrate on farming these days either.
sentences.chinese: 這些日子，伯德伍德的心思也集中不到農事上頭。

definition: the whole year must be planned for in the spring (idiom)/early planning is the key to success
pinyin: yi1 nian2 zhi1 ji4 zai4 yu2 chun1

definition: beginning of spring/the lunar New Year
fishing and hunting/fig. to loot/to plunder
timing (of a signal or sequence)/time course
to restore old way/to return to the past
Mangzhong or Grain in Beard, 9th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th June
Jingzhe or Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th March
